entry.title: No watches or warnings in effect, Clarenville
entry.summary: No watches or warnings in effect.

entry.title: Friday: A few showers. Temperature falling to plus 1 this afternoon.
entry.summary: A few showers ending this afternoon then mainly cloudy. Wind south 60 km/h gusting to 80 becoming southwest 40 gusting to 60 this morning. Temperature falling to plus 1 this afternoon. Forecast issued 05:30 AM NST Friday 27 January 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 7.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Clearing before morning. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming northwest 20 overnight. Low minus 7. Wind chill minus 14 overnight. Forecast issued 05:30 AM NST Friday 27 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Sunny. High minus 2.
entry.summary: Sunny. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light in the morning. High minus 2. Wind chill minus 14 in the morning and minus 4 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 05:30 AM NST Friday 27 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Cloudy periods. Low minus 6.
entry.summary: Cloudy periods. Low minus 6. Forecast issued 05:30 AM NST Friday 27 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries or rain showers. High plus 3. POP 40%
